title: Diamond+ Ranked team
body:
Hey there guys, finally hit diamond, could continue playing solo queue but i wanted to get to diamond and find diamond teamates to create a team so here we are!

Plan on entering tournaments so being local to melbourne would be good but not essential, is always online tourneys haha. Would be good to get team into diamond by season end so active players would be good.
Looking for Top, supp, adc and jg, diamond 5+ onlyyyyy, hmu in game or on here for an add - Kimahri

Edit, looking for a TOP laners and a Supp, lemme know if you want to join! :)

replies.body: I'm keen! Congrats on Diamond. I remember when you were just a lonely little platinum 5 Anivia main :P
haha nice, yes! training other champs for teams, well and truly have enough practice on Aniv haha :P
